original_title: The Art of Crossing a Bridge
overview: Camilo is a young Cuban living in Sweden. He is creative and free-spirited, and he loves his Danish wife, but unfortunately the rules and regulations of the Danish and Swedish societies obstruct their wish to live a peaceful life. They embark on a Kafkaesque journey through the European legal systems, and end up not being allowed to stay in Denmark, or Sweden; in fact anywhere at all. As the legal decisions threaten to ruin their relationship, Camilo ultimately faces an impossible dilemma: Should he go back to Cuba, possibly ending up in prison, or should he stay in Scandinavia illegally, with or without the love of his life?
title: The Art of Crossing a Bridge
